page.title: 14A DAY IN TORTHORWALD
page.content: I get up at 08.00, get dressed and have a bowl of cornflakes, I walk to school and arrive about 09.00 when school starts. We have Maths, English, T.V. Broadcasts and project work. The lunch hour is 12.30 _ 13.30 and we have a cooked meal. School ends at 15.30 and I walk home and play on the computer. We have tea when my dad comes home, about 18.00. For tea, we have chips, meat and vegetables. We have a cup of coffee after. I watch T.V. until about 20.00 and I have a cup of coffee and a biscuit, then I go to bed.
